title: Qlozet Shopping App
description: The Qlozet Customer Web App offers a seamless made-to-measure fashion experience. Customers can explore curated collections from multiple vendors, input or upload AI-captured body measurements, customize outfit styles and fabrics, and place bespoke or ready-to-wear orders — all from one platform. It’s designed for convenience, personalization, and a clear overview of past orders, measurements, and vendor interactions.
